title: The F1 drivers who conquered Indy
summary: From Jim Clark's historic 1965 triumph to Marcus Ericsson's recent victory, a select group of Formula 1 stars have etched their names into Indianapolis 500 lore by conquering IndyCar's legendary race

qa_pairs.question: Who was the first Formula 1 driver to win the Indianapolis 500?
Which driver won the Indianapolis 500 in 2022?
What year did Jim Clark achieve his Indianapolis 500 victory?
